org.jruyi.core

Interface IChannelAdminConfiguration


  • public interface IChannelAdminConfiguration
    This interface defines methods to configure channel admin.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int capacityOfIoRingBuffer()
      Returns the capacity of IO ring buffer.
      IChannelAdminConfiguration capacityOfIoRingBuffer(int capacityOfIoRingBuffer)
      Configures the capacity of the IO ring buffer.
      java.lang.Integer numberOfIoThreads()
      Returns the number of IO threads, or null which means the number is calculated based on the number of CPU cores.
      IChannelAdminConfiguration numberOfIoThreads(java.lang.Integer numberOfIoThreads)
      Configures the number of IO threads.
      java.lang.Integer numberOfSelectorThreads()
      Returns the number of selector threads, or null which means the number is calculated based on the number of CPU cores.
      IChannelAdminConfiguration numberOfSelectorThreads(java.lang.Integer numberOfSelectorThreads)
      Configures the number of selector threads.

    • Method Detail

      • numberOfSelectorThreads

        IChannelAdminConfiguration numberOfSelectorThreads(java.lang.Integer numberOfSelectorThreads)
        Configures the number of selector threads.
        Parameters:
        numberOfSelectorThreads - the number of selector threads to configure
        Returns:
        this object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if numberOfSelectorThreads < 0
